channel.title: The Lounge on sahilister's Reimagined Doodle
channel.description: Recent content in The Lounge on sahilister's Reimagined Doodle

item.title: Simple IRC Bouncer using The Lounge
item.description: I use matrix services to communicate online and to bridge into IRC channels. So the other day, Element was giving some trouble, and I was into a long conversation with someone on IRC. To access IRC, I found “The Lounge” in my Yunohost instance directory. Yunohost is a Debian distribution one can say, which provides a Web GUI to manage and install application with a few clicks doing the heavy work for you with less to non server knowhow.
